data.name: Thief's Shelter Demo
data.detailed_description:
Thief's Shelter Demo is a showcase of some unique mechanisms of the final game, as well as a glimpse of the visual and audio atmosphere.

As Detective James, your goal is to investigate 3 floors and find clues useful enough to solve the portraits puzzle.

The rest, should not be described, as it is an adventure meant to be experienced by yourself.

Events from the demo are not a part of the final product.

Headsets and controller are recommended
data.about_the_game:
Thief's Shelter Demo is a showcase of some unique mechanisms of the final game, as well as a glimpse of the visual and audio atmosphere.

As Detective James, your goal is to investigate 3 floors and find clues useful enough to solve the portraits puzzle.

The rest, should not be described, as it is an adventure meant to be experienced by yourself.

Events from the demo are not a part of the final product.

Headsets and controller are recommended
data.short_description: Take up the role of Detective James as you try to uncover a mysterious criminal's hidden identity. Reveal deep and disturbing secrets, solve unique puzzles and bring the schemes of a dark Cult to light. All under the effect of Dementia, a syndrome capable of making you mistrust even your own self

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit version only)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-540M Processor / AMD Ryzen™ 5 2500X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: @1080p NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 1050
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible, headphones recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
